DOC.brief_summary: This study ass safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics ASP1941 healthy adult male subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Safety Tolerability ASP1941 After Single Repeated Administration Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: This study consist two part . In part-1 , single oral dose ASP1941 placebo administer healthy adult male subject investigate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics healthy adult male . In part-2 , ASP1941 placebo administer multiple dose regimen .
DOC.criteria: Body weight : 50.0 kg ≤ weight < 85.0 kg Body mass index:17.6 ≤ BMI < 26.4 Those provide write informed consent Medical history Hepatic disease , heart disease , respiratory disease , gastrointestinal disease , renal disease , cerebrovascular disease , malignant tumor drug allergy Those whose blood pressure , pulse rate , body temperature 12lead ECG abnormal range Those whose labtest result abnormal range Those received medical treatment within 14 day prior study Those attend another clinical study postmarketing clinical trial within 120 day study Those received ASP1941 Those donate least 400ml whole blood within 90 day study , least 200ml 30 day study blood component within 14 day study Those within fast plasma glucose level < 70mg/dL 110 mg/dL HbA1C . 5.8 %
